title: de-> Adapt Version 2.0 demonstration
description: de-> A sample course demonstrating the capabilities of the Adapt Version 2.0
body:
de-> Welcome to the demonstration build for Version 2.0 of the Adapt framework.

We’ve added some major new items of functionality to Adapt for this release, most notably accessibility to WAI level AA, Right to Left language support and greatly improved assessments. If you’d like to find out more about this, along with the the other improvements we’ve made then please read the release notes (Link to follow for demo).

_submit.ariaLabel: de-> Submit your answer by clicking here.

_reset.ariaLabel: de-> Reset the question by clicking here.

_showCorrectAnswer.ariaLabel: de-> Show the correct answer by clicking here.

_hideCorrectAnswer.ariaLabel: de-> Show the answer you gave by clicking here.

_showFeedback.ariaLabel: de-> View the question feedback again by clicking here.

_buttons.disabledAriaLabel: de-> This button is disabled at the moment.

_accordion.ariaRegion: de-> This component is an accordion comprised of collapsible content panels containing display text. Select the item titles to toggle the visibility of these content panels.

_gmcq.ariaRegion: de-> This component is a graphical multiple choice question. Once you have selected an option select the submit button below.

_hotgraphic.ariaRegion: de-> Below is a component which allows you to select hot spots over an image. Select a hot spot to trigger a popup that includes an image with display text. Select the close button to close the popup.

_matching.ariaRegion: de-> This question component requires you to select the matching answer from a drop down list below. When you have selected your answers select the submit button.

_mcq.ariaRegion: de-> This component is a multiple choice question. Once you have selected an option select the submit button below

_media.ariaRegion: de-> This is a media component which plays a video. Select the play / pause button to watch or listen.
_media.transcriptButton: de-> Alternatively you can select the link below for the transcript.

_narrative.ariaRegion: de-> This component displays an image gallery with accompanying text. Use the next and back navigation controls to work through the narrative.

_slider.ariaRegion: de-> This component requires you to answer the question by selecting the relevant value. After selecting a value select the submit button below.

_textinput.ariaRegion: de-> This question component requires you to input your answer in the textbox provided. When you have answered the question select the submit button below.

_boxmenu.menuEnd: You have reached the end of the menu.

_accessibilityInstructions.touch: de-> Usage instructions. Use swipe right for next. Use swipe left for previous. Use a double tap to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page.
_accessibilityInstructions.notouch: de-> Usage instructions. Use tab for next. Use shift tab for previous. Use enter to select. Use escape to go to the top of the page.
_accessibilityInstructions.ipad: de-> Usage instructions for touchscreens. Use swipe right for next. Use swipe left for previous. Use a double tap to select. Use a two finger slide up to go to the top of the page. Usage instructions for keyboard access. Use right for next. Use left for previous. Use up and down together to select.

_glossaryItems.description:
The Adapt Framework is a generic, reusable codebase for e-learning courses.
The Adapt Framework is designed to work with the Adapt Authoring Tool (as soon as this is released) but can also be used in isolation.
